body_html:
Forced to use anaconda3 while working on a cluster with no sudo permission, i figured out that pip install tensorflow-serving-api only works for python 2.7.12 or higher python 2.7.9 fails.
@jieliuu you might check your version + good luck
body_text:
Forced to use anaconda3 while working on a cluster with no sudo permission, i figured out that pip install tensorflow-serving-api only works for python 2.7.12 or higher python 2.7.9 fails.
@jieliuu you might check your version + good luck
body:
Forced to use anaconda3 while working on a cluster with no sudo permission, i figured out that `pip install tensorflow-serving-api` only works for python 2.7.12 or higher python 2.7.9 fails.
@jieliuu you might check your version + good luck
